metadata.title: CVE-2013-7098 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
OpenConnect VPN client with GnuTLS before 5.02 contains a heap overflow ifMTU is increased on reconnection.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7098` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenconnect5 - 5.02-1
openconnect - 5.02-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: openconnect package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.02-1').
